name: Mohsen Jozani
content: SCCS Faculty Skip to main contentBack to Top Computer & Cyber Sciences Augusta University Computer & Cyber Sciences Faculty Our Faculty Meet the brilliant minds shaping the future of technology at Augusta University's School of Computer and Cyber Sciences. Our faculty comprises accomplished researchers, seasoned industry professionals, and dedicated educators committed to providing you with an unparalleled learning experience. Their expertise spans a wide range of disciplines, from cutting-edge cybersecurity and artificial intelligence to advanced software development and data science, ensuring you receive instruction from leaders in their respective fields. Explore their profiles to discover the depth of their knowledge and the passion they bring to empowering the next generation of tech innovators.
